General.Name: Cincon Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Cincon Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells switch mode power conversion products to the communications, computer, industrial, medical, consumer, and lighting markets in Asia, Europe, the United States, and Oceania. Its products include single and multiple output DC-DC converters from 1W to 750W, single and multiple output AC-DC adapters from 5W to 220W, open frame AC-DC power supplies from 4W to 700W, and LED power supplies from 15W to 150W. The company provides modified standard and custom power conversion products. In addition, it offers AC-DC converters and power supply related products. Cincon Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 306, Hsin Yi Road, Taipei, Taiwan
